experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Onboarded 450+ AC technicians for Summer Season 2020 in Kolkata.• Successfully sold the Minimum Guarantee Plan with 130% subscription - 3 weeks before the sprint end-date.• Managed live customer requests; maintaining 3% request loss - city lowest for February’20.

organizations.title: The FoodATM
organizations.description: The Food ATM is an initiative to act & spread awareness for our vision of hunger-free Kolkata where there are happy people who never sleep hungry.The aim is to set up kiosks across the city which are refilled through various individuals, households and eateries.
